entries.complete: Dartas Pytin: <That was a close one, pilot! But you survived. Well done! Our job is not done, however.>
entries.split_quest_alert: Dartas Pytin: <We're at the final, battle, my friend. It will be long and difficult, I'm afraid. The Black Sun have amassed a large attack and our fleet is meeting them head-on. I want you to be there. You're one of the best pilots we have!>
entries.title: The Trinity: Ambush!
entries.title_d: 'The Black Sun have sent their assassins for me!'
